author: mariadalfonso
body:
Update of HCAL@HLT  for Run3

contain a customization function to:
1) remove depth collapsing: the HLT is now identical to the Offline, both HB and HE are phase1 upgrade
2) update Mahi: following the Run2-legacy/Run3 offline setup

Note a separate function is provided for the Run2-2018: 
(note in 2018 HB is stille phase0 - QIE8 on and only one depth) 

A number of duplicates where identified and suggested to remove for Run3
title: HBHE: HLT Run3 configuration
